comments: Look for User-Agent matches in this file order: 'bots', 'apps', 'libraries', 'browsers', and return the first entry matched, processing each entry in order in which they appear in the file.

entries.name: AirableBot
entries.description: An aggregator of internet radio and podcasts, for connected devices.

entries.name: Alexa Flash Briefing cache
entries.description: A service which downloads, caches and normalises audio for the Flash Briefing service on Alexa-enabled devices
entries.comments: Stats are available within the Alexa skills dashboard.

entries.name: Amazon Music Podcasts Bot
entries.description: A music and podcasts streaming app

entries.name: Anchor Importer
entries.description: Anchor's tool for importing podcasts
entries.comments: This useragent is used during a user importing a podcast to the Anchor platform

entries.name: Apple Podcasts (Watch)
entries.comments: Verified (via stamping the audio URL with the RSS useragent) as being sourced from Apple Podcasts; and accordingly this is marked as a bot since these downloads are duplicated with the phone.
examples: atc/1.0 watchOS/6.2 model/Watch3,3 hwp/t8004 build/17T529 (6; dt:155)
atc/1.0 watchOS/6.2.8 model/Watch2,3 hwp/t8002 build/17U63 (6; dt:133)

atc/1.0 watchOS/6.2.8 model/Watch4,2 hwp/t8006 build/17U63 (6; dt:191)

atc/1.0 watchOS/7.0.2 model/Watch5,11 hwp/t8006 build/18R402 (6; dt:234)
atc/1.0 watchOS/7.1 model/Watch4,2 hwp/t8006 build/18R590 (6; dt:191)
atc/1.0 watchOS/7.1 model/Watch4,3 hwp/t8006 build/18R590 (6; dt:192)
atc/1.0 watchOS/7.1 model/Watch4,4 hwp/t8006 build/18R590 (6; dt:193)
atc/1.0 watchOS/7.1 model/Watch5,1 hwp/t8006 build/18R590 (6; dt:201)

atc/1.0 watchOS/7.1 model/Watch5,4 hwp/t8006 build/18R590 (6; dt:202)

entries.name: Applebot
entries.description: Applebot is the web crawler for Apple. Products like Siri and Spotlight Suggestions use Applebot.

entries.name: Archive.org
entries.description: The Internet Archive is a nonprofit digital library that preserves web data and makes it available for research purposes through the Wayback Machine.

entries.name: British Library
entries.description: British Library's legal deposit web crawler

entries.name: Critical Mention
entries.description: Critical Mention is a business intelligence company, monitoring podcasts on the web for their clients

entries.name: curl
examples: PycURL/7.43.0 libcurl/7.47.0 GnuTLS/3.4.10 zlib/1.2.8 libidn/1.32 librtmp/2.3

entries.name: DataforSEO
entries.description: Working on the biggest available backlink database on the web that every single member of the community, including you, can use and benefit from.

entries.name: F-Secure Riddler
entries.description: an online research project which investigates algorithms for mapping the topology of the Internet

entries.name: Facebook Bot
entries.comments: The podcastbot UA appears to be part of Facebook Podcasts onboarding

entries.name: Goodpods Bot
entries.description: The social podcasting app
entries.comments: RSS scraper / podcast verifier. Contact hello at goodpods dot com.

entries.name: Googlebot
entries.description: Google's search bots
examples: Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 6.0.1; Nexus 5X Build/MMB29P) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/86.0.4240.96 Mobile Safari/537.36 (compatible; Googlebot/2.1; http://www.google.com/bot.html)

entries.name: Gumball
entries.description: An attribution service (known as Gumshoe) from the Gumball network

entries.name: Headliner
entries.comments: A tool that takes audio to reformat it for video platforms

entries.name: Internet Archive
entries.description: Archive-It is a web archiving service that allows institutions to build and preserve collections of born digital content saving this content for future generations.

entries.name: l'Institut national de l'audiovisuel
entries.comments: Institut National de l'Audiovisuel is a repository of all French radio and television audiovisual archives.

entries.name: LTX71
entries.description: We continuously scan the internet for security research purposes.

entries.name: Microsoft Bingbot
examples: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/534 (KHTML, like Gecko) BingPreview/1.0b

entries.name: Overcast feed parser
entries.comments: Marco Arment says: when a new episode is detected, the servers fetch a copy of it to seed these values with an initial set of data to make the privacy screen more accurate.

entries.name: PetalBot
entries.description: PetalBot is an automatic program of the Petal search engine.
examples: Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 7.0;) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Mobile Safari/537.36 (compatible; PetalBot; https://aspiegel.com/petalbot)

entries.name: PodCloud
entries.description: Le podcast, simplement. A French-language web-based podcast player.
entries.comments: This useragent is a bot, doing feed updates and downloading media files. It was observed every six hours. User plays will have a standard browser useragent with a referer of https://podcloud.fr/

entries.name: Podcorn
entries.description: The leading podcast influencer marketplace. Connecting unique voices to unique brands for native advertising.

entries.name: PodderBot
entries.description: PodderApp bot
entries.comments: PodderApp bot for RSS fetching / verification

entries.name: Podfollow
entries.description: Podfollow, a service to help link to your podcast

entries.name: Podhound
entries.description: AI-powered podcast discovery
entries.comments: 'It grabs it once to get the audio file length.', says the developer.

entries.name: Podio Bot
entries.description: Podcasts + Radio = Podio
entries.comments: This useragent appears to download and cache audio

entries.name: Podnews
entries.description: Podnews runs a number of bots to read and test RSS and audio files

entries.name: Podnods Bot
entries.description: Podnods is a podcast discovery site. This user agent is for crawling podcast data.

entries.name: Podverse Feed Parser
entries.description: The Podverse feed parser.
entries.comments: This service parses publicly-accessible RSS feeds on a timer, then stores parsed data in the Podverse database.

entries.name: RedCircle
entries.description: A platform for podcasts and brands to scale their message.

entries.name: RSS to Telegram
entries.description: an RSS to Telegram bot

entries.name: Spotify cache service
entries.comments: This useragent, currently simply Spotify/1.0, is used when retrieving the RSS and audio for Spotify's catalogue. It isn't used for passthru.

entries.name: Vurbl
entries.description: An audio streaming destination

entries.name: YaCy
entries.description: Decentralized Web Search
examples: yacybot (/global; amd64 Linux 5.9.8-zen1-1-zen; java 1.8.0_265; Europe/de) http://yacy.net/bot.html
